General.Name: K&K Superstore Southern Public Company Limited
General.Description: K&K Superstore Southern Public Company Limited distributes consumer products in Thailand. It offers utensils products, including household cleaning products, such as detergents, fabric softeners, compressed petals, etc.; daily use products, which include toothpaste, toothbrush, mouthwash, etc.; skin and hair products that comprise shampoo, shower cream, soap, etc.; beauty products comprising powder, cream, skin care, cologne, etc.; and brushes for milk, baby diapers, adult diapers, etc. for children and adults. The company also provides consumer products that include beverage products consisting of cocoa powder, coffee, non-dairy cream, etc.; flavored milk products, such as milk powder, sweetened condensed milk, UHT milk, etc.; beverage products, including drinking water, soft drinks, health drinks, etc.; condiments and dry food products comprising condiments, vegetable oil, rice, etc.; and snack products, which include chewing gum, candy, etc. K&K Superstore Southern Public Company Limited was founded in 1993 and is based in Songkhla, Thailand.
